def_en: A wreath is an arrangement of flowers and leaves, usually in the shape of a circle, which you put on a grave or by a statue to show that you remember a person who has died or people who have died.
A wreath is a circle of leaves or flowers which someone wears around their head.

def_cn: （某些人圣诞节时挂在家门上的）花环
def_en: A wreath is a circle of leaves which some people hang on the front door of their house at Christmas.
